ID="power_2__1"><SENSE-NUM>1</SENSE-NUM><SENSE-CONTENT><SYNTAX-CODING><SEP> [</SEP>transitive<SEP>]</SEP></SYNTAX-CODING><DEFINITION query="yes" resource="dict_american"> to give a machine or vehicle power</DEFINITION><EXAMPLES ID="power_2__2"><EXAMPLE>a new vehicle powered by fuel cells</EXAMPLE></EXAMPLES><TXREF txtitle="To make a machine or piece of equipment work: " topic="power_2__1" thesaurus="american"><Ref dictionary="american" entryId="activate" bookmark="activate__1">activate</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="american" entryId="actuate" bookmark="actuate__1">actuate</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="american" entryId="coax" bookmark="coax__1">coax</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="american" entryId="control_2" bookmark="control_2__5">control</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="american" entryId="crank_2" bookmark="crank_2__1">crank</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="american" entryId="eject" bookmark="eject__4">eject</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="american" entryId="energize" bookmark="energize__2">energize</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="american" entryId="engage" bookmark="engage__6">engage</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="american" entryId="flash_1" bookmark="flash_1__5">flash</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="american" entryId="flick_1" bookmark="flick_1__9">flick</Ref></TXREF></SENSE-CONTENT></SENSE><SENSE ID="power_2__3"><SENSE-NUM>2</SENSE-NUM><SENSE-CONTENT><SYNTAX-CODING><SEP> [</SEP>intransitive<SEP>]</SEP></SYNTAX-CODING><STYLE-LEVEL> mainly journalism</STYLE-LEVEL><DEFINITION resource="dict_american" query="yes"> to move very quickly, so that you defeat others</DEFINITION><EXAMPLES ID="power_2__4"><PATTERNS-COLLOCATIONS>power through/past</PATTERNS-COLLOCATIONS><SEP>: </SEP><EXAMPLE>She powered through the last lap of the race.</EXAMPLE></EXAMPLES><TXREF txtitle="To move somewhere quickly: " topic="power_2__3" thesaurus="american"><Ref dictionary="american" entryId="fly_1" bookmark="fly_1__26">fly</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="american" entryId="hasten" bookmark="hasten__3">hasten</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="american" entryId="speed_2" bookmark="speed_2__1">speed</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="american" entryId="dart_2" bookmark="dart_2__1">dart</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="american" entryId="outpace" bookmark="outpace__2">outpace</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="american" entryId="charge_2" bookmark="charge_2__20">charge</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="american" entryId="be-quick-on-your-feet" bookmark="be-quick-on-your-feet__1">be quick on your feet</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="american" entryId="race_2" bookmark="race_2__6">race</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="american" entryId="gallop_1" bookmark="gallop_1__5">gallop</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="american" entryId="surge_1" bookmark="surge_1__3">surge</Ref></TXREF></SENSE-CONTENT></SENSE><PV-XREF xmlns:e="urn:IDMEE" ID="power_2__5"><SEP>See also phrasal verbs:</SEP><Ref dictionary="american" entryId="power-down">power down</Ref></PV-XREF><PV-XREF xmlns:e="urn:IDMEE"><Ref dictionary="american" entryId="power-up">power up</Ref></PV-XREF></HOMOGRAPH>
